ai-kv17.6:0.4_0: Discussion of the nine prohibitions to make proclamation:
ai-kv17.6:1.2_0: if he receives it with the Sangha.
ai-kv17.6:1.4_0: It’s not worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods, worthy of hospitality, worthy of a religious donation, worthy of greeting with joined palms, and is the supreme field of merit for the world.
ai-kv17.6:1.6_0: If the Saṅgha is worthy of offerings, worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods, worthy of hospitality, worthy of a religious donation, worthy of greeting with joined palms, and is the supreme field of merit for the world.
ai-kv17.6:1.7_0: if he receives it with the Sangha.
ai-kv17.6:2.2_0: if he receives it with the Sangha.
ai-kv17.6:2.4_0: Doesn’t the four pairs of persons?
ai-kv17.6:2.6_0: If a pair of men were struck by the Buddha, the four pairs of persons said:
ai-kv17.6:2.7_0: if he receives it with the Sangha.
ai-kv17.6:3.2_0: if he receives it with the Sangha.
ai-kv17.6:3.4_0: Or they give gifts to the Saṅgha,
ai-kv17.6:3.6_0: One gives a gift to the Saṅgha, thinking,
ai-kv17.6:3.7_0: if he receives it with the Sangha.
ai-kv17.6:3.8_0: There are no robe-cloth belonging to the Sangha ...
ai-kv17.6:3.16_0: Where there is nothing that can be said,
ai-kv17.6:3.17_0: if he receives it with the Sangha.
ai-kv17.6:4.2_0: if he receives it with the Sangha.
ai-kv17.6:5.3_0: The Saṅgha is accomplished in immersion.
ai-kv17.6:6.3_0: for the Sangha receives a religious donation.
ai-kv17.6:7.1_0: The Sangha receives a religious donation.
ai-kv17.6:7.3_0: if she receives the path to fruit;
ai-kv17.6:7.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.6:7.5_0: The Sangha should not accept the offering, etc.
